name: CreateCampaignFolder
description:
Create a new campaign folder in Mailchimp.

This tool is used to create a new campaign folder within Mailchimp marketing. Call this tool when you need to organize campaigns into folders for better management.

parameters.name: folder_name
parameters.description: The name to assign to the new campaign folder. It should be a descriptive string that helps identify the folder's contents.

value_schema.description: Name to associate with the folder.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name to associate with the folder.

value_schema.description: Name to associate with the folder.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
